original_text:
Sphinx Wild
La slot Sphinx Wild è una versione della famosa slot Sphinx con un gioco che si concentra maggiormente sul jolly. In questa pagina ne scopriremo tutte le caratteristiche, evidenziando che qui potete giocarci gratis senza registrazione.
Preparatevi ad entrare nelle piramidi dell’antico Egitto, in compagna di nessun altro tranne che del vostro spirito d’avventura.
Questa slot è prodotta da IGT,  presenta 40 linee di pagamento in un display speciale in formato 4×5. Oltre ai jolly, protagonisti del gioco, la slot Sphinx Wild presenta anche simboli scatter, simboli espandibili e dei giri bonus gratuiti.

Grafica della slot machine
Così come nella versione più famosa, anche la grafica della slot Sphinx si attiene allo stile minimale. A differenza della versione classica, qui manca l’elemento del gioco bonus dell’entrata nelle piramidi, che costituiva una parentesi con una grafica affascinante.
Nella slot Sphinx Wild, il gioco si svolge tutto nella videata iniziale, sui rulli, senza entrare quindi in altri ambienti virtuali.
I simboli della slot, così come nella versione classica, includono il sarcofago del faraone (che rappresenta il jolly del gioco), piramidi (simbolo scatter), ventagli, oggetti sacri tra cui amuleti, gioielli e occhi di Ra.

Le funzioni e i bonus della slot Sphinx Wild
Le funzioni speciali vengono attivate con i simboli speciali:

Jolly (sarcofago del faraone): si presenta su due caselle e può espandersi su tutti i rulli circostanti nel caso in cui l’espansione risultasse in una vincita.
Scatter (piramidi): pagano in qualsiasi posizione appaiono e possono pagare fino a 25x la puntata totale (5 piramidi che appaiono nello stesso giro, anche in ordine sparso, non necessariamente sulle linee di pagamento).

Poniamo l’attenzione sul simbolo jolly, che è il vero protagonista del gioco. Infatti, come abbiamo specificato nel primo punto, nel caso in cui l’espansione risulti in una vincita, si possono ottenere numerose caselle jolly in uno stesso giro, per delle vincite molto alte.
Tra le funzioni speciali, oltre al jolly espandibile, abbiamo i bonus giri gratis. Visualizzando 3 o più simboli piramide in qualsiasi posizione sui rulli, oltre a vincere un premio per la combinazione dei simboli sparsi, si accede anche al gioco bonus free spin, in cui vincere fino a 60 giri gratuiti (con moltiplicatore x1) oppure 14 giri gratuiti (con moltiplicatore x5).

Valutazione della slot Sphinx Wild
Sebbene la grafica non faccia impazzire, gli alti premi che si possono vincere con i jolly espandibili fa dimenticare di tutto il resto. Si tratta quindi di una slot certamente interessante, non a caso creata dallo stesso fornitore della Sphinx, una delle slot più di successo negli ultimi anni.
La percentuale di RTP (Return To Player o Ritorno al Giocatore) della slot Sphinx Wild si aggira attorno al 96%, cosa che la rende sicuramente interessante anche da un punto di vista dei pagamenti.

Sul casinò online Netbet. Ricordiamo che è consigliato giocare soltanto sui casino presenti in Italia con licenza ADM, poiché sono sicuri al 100%.



Quanto si può vincere alla slot Sphinx Wild?

Dipende da vari fattori, tra i quali l'importo della scommessa e le combinazioni vincenti che si ottengono.



Quale bonus casinò posso usare per giocarci?

Sotto la slot in versione gratuita sul nostro sito trovi i casinò in cui giocarci con soldi veri. Per ogni casinò abbiamo pubblicato una recensione completa con tutti i bonus disponibili, anche quelli esclusivi per i nostri lettori.

Sphinx Wild
The Sphinx Wild slot game is a version of the famous Sphinx slot, with a game that focuses more on the wild symbol. On this page, we will discover all its features, highlighting the fact that you can play it for free without registering. Get ready to enter the pyramids of ancient Egypt, with none other than your adventurous spirit by your side. Produced by IGT, this slot features 40 paylines in a special display format of 4x5. In addition to the game's wild symbols, the Sphinx Wild slot also features scatter symbols, expanding symbols, and free bonus spins.

Slot machine graphics
Just like in the classic version, the graphics of the Sphinx slot adhere to a minimal style. Unlike the classic version, the bonus element of entering the pyramids, which had a fascinating design, is missing in the Sphinx Wild slot. In the Sphinx Wild slot, the game takes place entirely on the initial screen, on the reels, without entering any other virtual environments. The slot symbols, just like in the classic version, include the pharaoh's sarcophagus (which represents the game's wild), pyramids (scatter symbol), fans, sacred objects including amulets, jewelry, and the eye of Ra.

Functions and bonuses of the Sphinx Wild slot
Special features are activated with special symbols:

Wild (Pharaoh's sarcophagus): appears on two squares and can expand to all surrounding reels if the expansion results in a win.
Scatter (pyramids): pays in any position they appear and can pay up to 25x the total bet (5 pyramids that appear in the same spin, even in different positions, not necessarily on paylines).

We put the focus on the Wild symbol, which is the true protagonist of the game. In fact, as we specified in the first point, if the expansion results in a win, you can get numerous wild squares in the same spin for very high winnings. Among the special features, in addition to the expanding wild, we have the free bonus spins. By viewing three or more pyramid symbols in any position on the reels, in addition to winning a prize for the combination of scattered symbols, you can also access the free spin bonus game, where you can win up to 60 free spins (with a x1 multiplier) or 14 free spins (with a x5 multiplier).

Sphinx Wild slot evaluation
Although the graphics are not amazing, the high prizes that can be won with expanding wilds make you forget about everything else. Therefore, it is certainly an interesting slot, created by the same supplier as the Sphinx, one of the most successful slots in recent years. The Sphinx Wild slot's Return to Player (RTP) percentage is around 96%, which makes it undoubtedly interesting from a payout perspective.

You can play the Sphinx Wild slot for free on SlotJava, as well as on hundreds of other slots, all without registering and without downloading any software.

At the Netbet online casino. Remember that it is recommended to only play on casinos licensed by ADM in Italy since they are 100% safe.

How much can you win on the Sphinx Wild slot?
It depends on various factors, including the amount of the bet and the winning combinations obtained.

What casino bonus can I use to play it?
Under the free version of the slot on our site, you can find the online casinos where you can play with real money. For each casino, we have published a complete review with all the available bonuses, including those exclusive to our readers.

How do you play the Sphinx Wild slot?
You must set the bet amount and click on the "Spin" button. The goal is to obtain combinations of identical symbols on the same payline. With free bonus spins, you can get extra spins and win without spending anything.

Review: Sphinx Wild
The Sphinx Wild slot game is a version of the famous Sphinx slot, with a game that focuses more on the wild symbol. On this page, we will discover all its features, highlighting the fact that you can play it for free without registering. Get ready to enter the pyramids of ancient Egypt, with none other than your adventurous spirit by your side. Produced by IGT, this slot features 40 paylines in a special display format of 4x5. In addition to the game's wild symbols, the Sphinx Wild slot also features scatter symbols, expanding symbols, and free bonus spins.

Slot machine graphics
Just like in the classic version, the graphics of the Sphinx slot adhere to a minimal style. Unlike the classic version, the bonus element of entering the pyramids, which had a fascinating design, is missing in the Sphinx Wild slot. In the Sphinx Wild slot, the game takes place entirely on the initial screen, on the reels, without entering any other virtual environments. The slot symbols, just like in the classic version, include the pharaoh's sarcophagus (which represents the game's wild), pyramids (scatter symbol), fans, sacred objects including amulets, jewelry, and the eye of Ra.

Functions and bonuses of the Sphinx Wild slot
Special features are activated with special symbols:

Wild (Pharaoh's sarcophagus): appears on two squares and can expand to all surrounding reels if the expansion results in a win.
Scatter (pyramids): pays in any position they appear and can pay up to 25x the total bet (5 pyramids that appear in the same spin, even in different positions, not necessarily on paylines).

We put the focus on the Wild symbol, which is the true protagonist of the game. In fact, as we specified in the first point, if the expansion results in a win, you can get numerous wild squares in the same spin for very high winnings. Among the special features, in addition to the expanding wild, we have the free bonus spins. By viewing three or more pyramid symbols in any position on the reels, in addition to winning a prize for the combination of scattered symbols, you can also access the free spin bonus game, where you can win up to 60 free spins (with a x1 multiplier) or 14 free spins (with a x5 multiplier).

Sphinx Wild slot evaluation
Although the graphics are not amazing, the high prizes that can be won with expanding wilds make you forget about everything else. Therefore, it is certainly an interesting slot, created by the same supplier as the Sphinx, one of the most successful slots in recent years. The Sphinx Wild slot's Return to Player (RTP) percentage is around 96%, which makes it undoubtedly interesting from a payout perspective.
